```{r}
library(tidyverse)  # Provides read_csv() and glimpse()
library(questionr)  # Provides freq()
```

```{r}
# Define the file path

file_path <- file.path("..", "data", "digital_habits_vs_mental_health.csv")
```

```{r}
# Load the CSV file into a dataframe
df <- read_csv(file_path)
```

```{r}
# View the first few rows
head(df)
```

```{r}
# Check column names
colnames(df)
```

```{r}
# View summary statistics
summary(df)
```

```{r}
# Check data structure
glimpse(df)
```

```{r}
# Create frequency table for social media platforms used
freq(as.ordered(df$social_media_platforms_used))

# Create frequency table for stress level
freq(as.ordered(df$stress_level))

# Create frequency table for mood score
freq(as.ordered(df$mood_score))
```
